title: Holiday Ziggs

embed.description: A skin splash I created because he looks like a small evil elf, and I love him! Holiday Ziggs

body:
I love this champion and I think he would look great in an elf suit lol {{champion:115}} 

[synclairekapturart.tumblr.com](http://synclairekapturart.tumblr.com)
[https://www.instagram.com/synclairekaptur/](https://www.instagram.com/synclairekaptur/)
[synclairekaptur.com ](http://synclairekaptur.com )

replies.body: This is dope.  Sweet skin, you should make the big bomb on his back like a star or something lol.
I wanna see Santa riding that Sleigh pulled by his Reindeer kamikaze style for the ult.  Not sure how ziggs could throw that ...but it would be funny to see.

Doesnt have to actually look like he's throwing it. However the satchel charge would be a Wrapped Gift box. and it could be random sizes/shapes/wrapping while the bouncing bomb would be randomly color/designed ornaments.

Yeah, not sure how the star would work. But I can see the gift box as an ult lol
Thanks for the comments =)
